trends: There has been one other sighting in Hancock

Summary: U.F.O "Spies & Defies" reflective sphere defies gravity! Mach 5 plus
divs: Sighting DetailsI was taking pictures of an airplane i had hered and upon review I noticed that I had found to my suprise that there was a shinny metal U.F.O Spying on and immediately getting behind it and takeing off in a completly different direction. totally mind blowing.
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
